p: In the same vein but this time with HF, the total protection of both plants was 60 min. Thereafter, it decreased to 24% and 27% for O. gratissimum and L. camara, respectively, at the very end of the experiments. In their combination, the repellent activity persisted up to 120 min of total protection after which it slowly came down to 62% at the end of the experiment. That equally may be a possible synergistic activity of HF formulation between L. camara and O. gratissimum (Table 1).
